body:
> Try SOLVER.WARMUP_FACTOR 0.03333 SOLVER.WARMUP_ITERS 1000 . #51

I change warm up as you said. Then, the loss will become non after 10k iterations. 
In addition, I train SSD300 on coco 2017 for 2 classes(person and background), I can't obtain a good model. These settings are that I have tried
LR: 0.001 and 0.0001
SOLVER.WARMUP_FACTOR 0.03333  and 0.1
SOLVER.WARMUP_ITERS 1000 and 500
The final best mAP is about 0.01 on person.

> have you solve this problem?

yes,
@qiuzhongwei-USTB   请问你能告诉我怎么修改的吗？我用已经转换为ＶＯＣ格式的caltech行人数据集，训练出mAP特别低　我除了修改数据集其他基本没改动过　请问是哪里出问题了呢？
I use the custom dataset and get very low mAP. Please tell me how to change to get the higher mAP.What is your method?

> I use the custom dataset and get very low mAP. Please tell me how to change to get the higher mAP.What is your method?

I don't know your experiments. I trained on coco.
Maybe,
you need to adjust your experiments setting for your data. It's not a bug, you should try more training strategy.

> > I use the custom dataset and get very low mAP. Please tell me how to change to get the higher mAP.What is your method?
> 
> I don't know your experiments. I trained on coco.
> Maybe,
> you need to adjust your experiments setting for your data. It's not a bug, you should try more training strategy.

ok,I'll try it.thanks a lot : )

> Hi,
> I train ssd300 with 1 class(person) in coco2017. LR is e-3, batch size 32*4 gpus.
> config file as follows:
> MODEL:
> NUM_CLASSES: 2
> PRIORS:
> FEATURE_MAPS: [38, 19, 10, 5, 3, 1]
> STRIDES: [8, 16, 32, 64, 100, 300]
> MIN_SIZES: [21, 45, 99, 153, 207, 261]
> MAX_SIZES: [45, 99, 153, 207, 261, 315]
> ASPECT_RATIOS: [[2], [2, 3], [2, 3], [2, 3], [2], [2]]
> BOXES_PER_LOCATION: [4, 6, 6, 6, 4, 4]
> INPUT:
> IMAGE_SIZE: 300
> DATASETS:
> TRAIN: ("coco_keypoints_2017_train", )
> TEST: ("coco_keypoints_2017_val", )
> PATH: "/data/dataset/coco"
> SOLVER:
> MAX_ITER: 400000
> LR_STEPS: [280000, 360000]
> GAMMA: 0.1
> BATCH_SIZE: 32
> LR: 1e-3
> WARMUP_FACTOR: 0.1
> WARMUP_ITERS: 1000
> TEST:
> MAX_PER_CLASS: 400
> 
> it seems that the loss curve is not same as your. Is there something wrong?
> ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/34059431/58334303-d915ce80-7e71-11e9-8d7c-c6c8049328ca.png)
> 
> and I set the LR as e-4, then, the loss curve is as follows:
> ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/34059431/58334416-15e1c580-7e72-11e9-8327-6a569a4420e6.png)
> the final mAP on person is about 0.01

Hi psyangIII,
May I know how did you use the tensorboard to plot the graph? because after I launch the tensorboard, I cannot find any graph.
Thank you so much.

> @qiuzhongwei-USTB   请问你能告诉我怎么修改的吗？我用已经转换为ＶＯＣ格式的caltech行人数据集，训练出mAP特别低　我除了修改数据集其他基本没改动过　请问是哪里出问题了呢？

请问你的问题解决了吗？

> > @qiuzhongwei-USTB   请问你能告诉我怎么修改的吗？我用已经转换为ＶＯＣ格式的caltech行人数据集，训练出mAP特别低　我除了修改数据集其他基本没改动过　请问是哪里出问题了呢？
> 
> 请问你的问题解决了吗？

请问你是怎么把那些图给生产？

use tensorbard==2.0
